Name: AirHelp
Description:
Use AirHelp and get paid when you’re delayed.

EU and U.S. laws protect airline passengers, giving them the right to compensation for travel disruptions. Flight delays, cancellations, diversions, and overbookings could mean hundreds in cash – if you know how to get it. With AirHelp, the process is as simple as downloading the app.

Just give us the necessary information, and we will get your money for you, with no hassle and no fees unless you are compensated. Flight delays happen, but that doesn’t mean you have to accept them. You deserve compensation for your troubles and AirHelp knows how to get it for you. 

The AirHelp app lets you easily check the eligibility of your flight and track your claims.

Name: Tips & Tricks - Secrets for iPad (Pro Edition)
Description:
Tips & Tricks – Secrets for iPad is your complete guidebook to all things iOS.

Whether you’re an iPad novice or a tablet veteran, we cover everything from getting started to hidden features and secret shortcuts. With 20 full chapters and over 200 tips, this app can help you become an iPhone power user!

If that’s not enough, our news feed is updated daily with app reviews, in-depth tutorials, and breaking Apple news. There’s something for everyone here, and it’s all free!

---

As seen in Apple's Best Apps of 2012 & 2013, Tips & Tricks – Secrets for iPad will help you learn shortcuts, discover hidden features, type faster, browse quicker, secure your data, maximize your battery life, and much more. Everything’s updated to cover the latest features of iOS 10.

The app also works on an iPhone, so you can read tips on an iPhone while you try them out on your iPad.

With over 10 million downloads, here’s what people are saying… 
5/5 “It's simple, logical, and beautifully designed. Very well done.”
5/5 “I used every tip! Very useful!!”
5/5 “So many tips I had no idea my phone could do.”
5/5 “A real eye-opener! I thought I knew a lot, but i didn't! ;-)”

So why not start mastering your iPad today. Download Tips & Tricks – iPad Secrets and become an iOS guru!

Name: Great Pet Escape – Help the happy pets jump to freedom!
Description:
The pets have escaped! Help them jump to freedom!
Tap to jump but beware of birds, spikes and catchers!
Collect coins to customize your pet, get powerups and enjoy upgrades!
Rest to restore energy, but not for too long otherwise you’ll be caught!
Collect treats, magnets & jetpacks to fly fast, attract coins & jump without energy!
Download and play FREE now!

** CHALLENGING ** ENTERTAINING ** ENDLESS HOURS OF FUN ** ADDICTIVE **

HOW TO PLAY
•Tap to jump and keep tapping to stay up.
•Watch your energy level – when it gets low, land on a fence post to restore energy.
•Don’t rest on a fence post for too long otherwise it will shake and you’ll be caught!
•Collect coins and use them to customize your pet, get upgrades and powerups.
•Collect heart treats to fly fast and get everything in your path without using energy.
•Collect jetpacks to jump without using energy.
•Collect magnets to attract coins.
•Avoid birds and spikes to boost your score, and avoid spikes when you have a jetpack.
•Optional: Want coins fast? Then purchase a coin package and customize your pet now.

If you love animals and pets, and enjoy jumping games, running games or racing games, you’ll love Great Pet Escape!

Have questions, comments or suggestions for improvement?  Then write your review here or email us at apps@convergecreative.com.  We want to hear from you!

Name: Heli Ambulance Rescue Help 3D
Description:
Get ready to start the flying adventure inside the city to Rescue people. Be the helicopter pilot to navigate rescue helicopter flight and landings to save peoples in emergency situations. Those who love playing rescue helicopter and air ambulance games will love to play city helicopter flight. Take control of your own rescue helicopter and fly inside the city. Fly in the skies and look around for emergency areas and rescue them all. Save lives of people in danger and fulfill the duty of an air ambulance pilot.
When you hear emergency alert you have to give quick response take seat to helicopter and take flight and reach their as soon as possible and save life. Take these city people to hospital and they can get fast treatment and rescued. 
You have to drive carefully and fast to rescue people. This is not easy. And this is best helicopter ambulance game in the big beautiful city. You have to take those people from the affected areas and fly them to the hospital. This is time to show your flying skills. The helicopter is equipped with simple and modern control. Take your army ambulance helicopter and carefully land on the affected area and improve your aviation flying skill and prove that you are the best pilot in the world. This is best simulation game. This game will capture your attention as it is one of the best game.
HOW TO PLAY:
Press left, right, up and down button to control the movement.
Up and down button to land and flying up.
FEATURES:
-Beautiful bit city with beautiful environment.
-Simple and smooth control.
-Different challenging 12 levels.
-Real flight game experience.
Hope you will like this game and your valuable reviews and comment help us to improve game

Name: iPad User: the companion iPad magazine for all models
Description:
iPad User Magazine is the complete companion guide for owners of any iPad model. Published every six weeks you’ll be kept up-to-date with the latest things to do on your iPad.

If you want to know what your iPad can really do, what the best apps are to get and how to kit out your new iPad, this is the only guide you’ll need. 

Our step-by-step guides help you get to know your iPad inside and out and will inspire you to go further. Whether it's all about the in-built applications or the pick of the App Store, we'll show you what you need to know.

Description:

Tap the bomb away when it falls down, before it gets to late for this brave men.

Name: 911 Ambulance Help Rescue
Description:
Become an 911 Amublance Driver and rescue people from danger.
Your mission is to save life at any cost. you have got very less time frame to rescue!
Choose the best route, avoid heavy traffic,Look out and avoid hitting pedestrians on the streets.
Reach on time and feel the pride of life saver!
Upgrade your ambulance and keep on saving lives!Be careful while driving you patient to the hospital.
Complete the different emergency levels and be a best ambulance help rescue.
Get yourself ready to drive 911 ambulance and help!!

Game features:
*Different missions ot compelete
*Upgrade new amublance
*Amazing 3D graphics and sound track
*Smooth controls
*Best routes to drive


How to play:
- Tap your iPhone / iPad on right side to drive / brake.
- Tap on left to control steering

Name: BTU Calculator - Air Conditioner
Description: A BTU calculator to help you buy the right air conditioner.
